snippet: Yaya Touré and Sergio Agüero produced late moments of brilliance to earn Manchester City a 2-0 win over host Aston Villa on Saturday.
abstract: Soccer Roundup; New York Red Bulls beat Houston Dynamo, 1-0; other soccer scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Yaya Touré and Sergio Agüero produced late moments of brilliance to earn Manchester City a 2-0 win over host Aston Villa on Saturday.

headline.main: Henry and Red Bulls Top Dynamo
headline.print_headline: Henry and Red Bulls Top Dynamo
